mapper.select:
select teb.id as id,teb.shop_id as shop_id,teb.serial_number as serial_number,teb.model_id as model_id, teb.capacity as capacity,teb.status as status,teb.create_time as create_time,teb.update_time as update_time, teb.del_flag as del_flag,teb.cabinet_id as cabinet_id from t_electricity_battery as teb left join electricity.t_store as ts on teb.shop_id=ts.id where teb.del_flag=0
and ts.area_id = #{areaId}

SELECT ebm.name as battery_model_name , ebm.capacity as model_capacity , ebm.voltage as model_voltage ,eb.* FROM t_electricity_battery eb LEFT JOIN t_electricity_battery_model ebm on eb.model_id = ebm.id LEFT JOIN t_user_info tui on tui.now_electricity_battery_sn = eb.serial_number WHERE tui.uid = #{uid};
